member.name: WICBitmapEncoderCacheOption
member.summary: Specifies the cache options available for an encoder.

member.name: WICBitmapEncoderCacheOption.WICBitmapEncoderCacheInMemory
member.summary: The encoder is cached in memory. This option is not supported.

member.name: WICBitmapEncoderCacheOption.WICBitmapEncoderCacheTempFile
member.summary: The encoder is cached to a temporary file. This option is not supported.
